TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PageNavigationEventHandler(object sender, PageNavigationEventArgs e);

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.PageNavigation"> event of a <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer>.
